Name: Tales of Agaris
About the game: A CLASSIC JRPG. Containing all the elements of a turn-based RPG. Elliot, Louis and Kary will be our heroes, facing a man named Lars and other challenges that will be awating for you. Rumors have speculated on the possibility of a frightening creature emerging. Indeed, may religious texts had spoken of the demon's arrival, and some rumors were based on such prophecies. However, the efforts of Lars, among the elite soldiers of King Grimfur's army, has helped to make the emergence a grim reality. Three soldiers work for world peace. They had established themselves in √Ågaris, and other portions of the world. One of their stated tasks to revive Rion. King Grimfur has a secret confidence for Rion to become in composition of the ever-grown armies of darkness. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, it is up to you, intrepid heroes, to defeat evil!
